A. Aibileen
B. Minny
C. Elaine Stein
D. Skeeter

Options:
A. Aibileen
B. Minny
C. Charlotte
D. Constantine

What is the outcome for the maids after the publication of 'The Help'?
Options:
A. They receive a permanent job offer from Skeeter.
B. They are given the equivalent of several weeks' pay.
C. They are invited to a celebration by the white community.
D. They are offered scholarships for further education.
Correct Answer: They are given the equivalent of several weeks' pay.
